item.title: Kalshi makes move to court crypto traders with tokenized betting contracts
item.description: Tokenization refers to creating a digital version of a real-world financial asset such as a stock, bond or treasury note.

item.title: As regime change looms at the Fed, one candidate emerges as frontrunner for chair
item.description: President Donald Trump knows who he's going to select as the next Federal Reserve chair but isn't saying yet.

item.title: Goldman Sachs acquires ETF firm for $2 billion in latest deal to bolster asset management division
item.description: Goldman Sachs has made asset and wealth management a priority since pivoting away from a consumer banking push.
